title: How to Woo a Girl Long Distance

steps.title: Let her know that it made you think of her.
steps.content: Let her know that it made you think of her. Sharing a love song is a great way to pique your crush’s romantic interest. [1] X Research source You might not be able to slow-dance with her in person, but you can still romance her with your favorite music. [2] X Expert Source John Keegan Dating Coach Expert Interview. 29 July 2021. Send her a sweet music video from YouTube, put together a playlist for her on Spotify, or make her an old-fashioned mixtape and send it in the mail! If you’re the musical type, you could even record yourself singing or playing a song for her.

steps.title: A love letter is a classic romantic gesture.
steps.content: A love letter is a classic romantic gesture. Write your feelings out on paper and send it in the mail. If you want, enclose a little something special, like a pressed flower or a photograph. Or, if you’re traveling somewhere, send her a postcard. [3] X Research source To make it extra special, you could even handmake a card for her . Reader Poll: We asked 562 wikiHow readers, and 64% agreed that the gesture they think would make their long-distance partner feel the most special is sending them sweet messages . [Take Poll]

steps.title: Care packages
steps.content: Care packages are a great way to show affection long-distance. Put a little thought into it—include things that you know she likes or can use. It’ll feel extra special if you don't tell her it’s coming beforehand! [4] X Research source For instance, you might include a selection of her favorite snacks, some pictures or mementos from time you’ve spent together (if you’ve ever met in person), or bath products with a scent she likes.

steps.title: Light up
steps.content: Light up her day with a cute surprise. You could also order a singing telegram, an Edible Arrangement, or a bottle of her favorite wine. Include a note to let her know that you’re thinking of her. [5] X Research source Before you pull out all the stops, consider her personality. For instance, if you think she’d be embarrassed by something like a singing telegram at work, go a little more low-key and stick to sending flowers to her home.

steps.title: Make a point of remembering birthdays and holidays.
steps.content: Make a point of remembering birthdays and holidays. If possible, plan out something special in advance. For instance, in addition to sending her a card or a gift, you might plan a virtual party or a special online date night. [6] X Research source Look for other reasons to celebrate with her, too. For example, you might arrange a little party for her if she just graduated from college or got a promotion at work.

steps.title: When you can’t see her in person, being direct is crucial.
steps.content: When you can’t see her in person, being direct is crucial. You won’t be able to rely on all those subtle forms of non-verbal communication, like lingering glances or gentle touches. [7] X Expert Source John Keegan Dating Coach Expert Interview. 29 July 2021. Instead, just come out and tell her what’s on your mind. [8] X Research source Let her know exactly how you feel about her and what she means to you. You could say something like, “I just wanted to say that even though we’ve never met, you’ve become really special to me.” Or, “Anytime I think about you, I start smiling. You’re so awesome, and I’m grateful that you’re a part of my life.”

steps.title: Most women find a sense of humor attractive.
steps.content: Most women find a sense of humor attractive. Want to win her heart? Tell her your favorite joke, share a funny story, or send her a hilarious video or meme. [9] X Research source The more you laugh together, the more likely it is that a romance will blossom. Try sending a corny dad joke, e.g., “Doing math homework again, huh? Honestly, you should just tell math to grow up and solve its own problems.” You could also go for something a little flirtier, like, “Too bad we can’t meet up for coffee, because I like you a whole latte!” Unless you know she enjoys dark humor, stick to good-natured jokes instead of mean-spirited ones.

steps.title: Don’t be scared to get vulnerable.
steps.content: Don’t be scared to get vulnerable. People who are able to share their deepest thoughts and feelings tend to have closer, more intimate relationships. [10] X Research source If she asks how you’re doing, give her a real answer. Share your hopes, dreams, and fears with her. You could even open up to her about something you’ve never shared with anyone else. Encourage her to share with you, too—and if she does confide in you, be supportive and listen without judgment. If you’re not sure what to talk about, try breaking the ice with a thought-provoking question. For example, you might ask something like, “What’s your most treasured memory?” or “If you could change one thing about your life, what would it be?” [11] X Trustworthy Source Greater Good in Action An initiative by UC Berkeley's Greater Good Science Center promoting science-based practices for a meaningful life Go to source Show a genuine interest in the things that are important to her. [12] X Expert Source John Keegan Dating Coach Expert Interview. 29 July 2021. For instance, if she’s passionate about her work, make sure to ask her about it often.

steps.title: Try to make it as much like a real date as you can.
steps.content: Try to make it as much like a real date as you can. You could share a virtual candlelight dinner, have drinks together over Zoom, or co-watch a romantic movie online. Put on a date-night outfit, just like you would if you were meeting in person. Do your best to make it feel special! [13] X Expert Source John Keegan Dating Coach Expert Interview. 29 July 2021. If you know her address, you could even surprise her by having flowers or a bottle of wine delivered to her home just in time for your date.

steps.title: Powerful moments create powerful emotions.
steps.content: Powerful moments create powerful emotions. Even if you can’t do anything exciting in person, look for ways to make your time together impactful. Something as simple as watching a thrilling movie together may be enough to boost her romantic feelings for you. [14] X Research source You can also try sharing other fun or exciting experiences with her virtually, such as: Going on a virtual roller coaster together (you can find lots of immersive 360° rides on YouTube) Sharing an online tour of a stunning location, like the Grand Canyon Taking an online class together about a subject you both enjoy Using FaceTime or Skype to take her on a virtual walk with you in one of your favorite places

steps.title: Keeping in touch helps nourish romantic feelings.
steps.content: Keeping in touch helps nourish romantic feelings. Being far apart can make it hard to get a relationship started. People who see each other a lot are more likely to fall in love. Try to make up for the distance by communicating often. [15] X Research source Just make sure she’s also interested in chatting—you don’t want to pester her so much that she gets annoyed! How often you should talk depends on things like your schedules and personalities. For example, if you’re both really busy, or if she’s a bit introverted, then once or twice a week might be reasonable. If you both can’t get enough of chatting with each other, you might aim for once a day. It can help to have a regularly scheduled time when you chat or do things together online. For instance, talk to her about getting together once a week to play games online, or get into a routine of checking in every evening after work.

steps.title: Don’t rely on just text and voice chat.
steps.content: Don’t rely on just text and voice chat. It’s a lot easier to connect romantically when you can see each other! Ask her if she’d be cool with talking over an app like FaceTime, Zoom, or Google Duo. That way, it’ll almost feel like you’re together in person. [16] X Research source If she’s up for it, try to make it a regular thing. For instance, you might get caught up over video chat once a week. When you connect over video, make an effort to look nice. Dress neatly, style your hair, and clean up your background so she’s not looking at a mess. Don’t forget to set up some flattering lighting, too!

steps.title: Meeting face to face helps reinforce online romances.
steps.content: Meeting face to face helps reinforce online romances. Even if you can’t get together right away, make plans with her to do it in the future. That way, you’ll both have something to look forward to—which can also bring you closer together! [17] X Research source If you live really far apart, consider meeting halfway at an interesting location. For instance, if she lives in Oregon and you live in Indiana, you could meet in South Dakota for a romantic hike in the Black Hills.
